name: LDJ-49 Critters
description:
A 3 button 4 colour pet raising game! Controls: (lots of options built in)

key 1 = 1, q, a, z, [1], [4], [7], j, left

  - Menus, Up, left

key 2 = 2, w, s, x, [2], [5], [8], k, down

  - Options, Down, Right

key 3 = 3, e, d, c, [3], [6], [9], l, right

  - Games, Confirm, Hit Ball-Keep 'em Up, Exit-Wall Kicker

Leave = esc, alt-f4

Features:

 - 19 creature options (including evolutions)

 - Feed them

 - Clean up after them

 - Random evolution when fully fed

 - Buy food to feed them

 - Buy furniture to decorate

 - 2 exponentially more difficult minigames

    - Wall Kicker

    - Keep 'em Up

 - Complete saving/loading (on Windows)

Credits:

 - Font: https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font

 - Music: Made with Autotracker by WibblyMat https://github.com/wibblymat/ld24/blob/master/autotracker.py

 - Pallet: Icecream GB by Kerrie Lake https://lospec.com/palette-list/ice-cream-gb

    - One of my fav pallets ever :3 

 - Engine: made with Unity 2020.3.18f1

 - Code: made with Visual Studio

 - Graphics: made with Aseprite

 - Notes/txt's: made with Notepad++

 - Made on Windows

Made by Beatrix/Bee-Tricks games >> https://twitter.com/pidge_v
